sentence.Network_en: Disinformation, best - case scenarios and a dose of self - hypnosis distort our theories.
sentence.Network_cn: 不实资讯, 理想情景, 自我 催眠曲解了我们的理论.

sentence.Network_en: Self hypnosis, counting backwards, visualizations, and mantras are but a few of the methods available.
sentence.Network_cn: 自我催眠 、 倒计数 、 观想 、 和念咒只是其中少数可行的方法.

sentence.Network_en: Do not self - comfort and self - hypnosis, or else the world will never abandon you!
sentence.Network_cn: 不要 自我 安慰, 自我 催眠, 否则这个世界永远舍弃你!

PerfectNetExp.abs: 自我催眠静心(self-hypnosis),观火静心( watch the fire meditation)

list.abs: So , does that imply that self hypnosis don ' t work ?, 那么 , 这是否意味着自我催眠没有作用了呢?

now if you're ready , let's hear from the horses' mouths as I interview all 6 participants about their 1st week's progress and their plans to improve their self hypnosis experience .现在如果你准备好了，让我们一起倾听他们的看法，我会和我们6位参与者面谈他们第一个星期的进展，和他们改进自我催眠经历的计划。

he was totally aware of it as well and was so happy with his results that he was already planning for another goal he would like to work concurrently with self hypnosis !他完全意识到了这个实验的作用，并且对获得的结果很高兴。他乐意在实施自我催眠实验的时候进行划另外一个计划！
Picking up the self hypnosis session once again gave her a great motivational boost ., 再一次学习自我催眠的会议给了她很大的动力促进.
